DOC.brief_title: Health Behaviors Time-of-Day : Older Adult Cognitive Function
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ask review inform consent consent study prior study procedure . There four stage study : 1. telephone interview , 2. in-person interview completion questionnaire , 3. in-home single night sleep recording , 4. two week computerize cognitive testing , subjective sleep pain recording , wear Actiwatch . During telephone interview , participant ask question age , sleep , pain , medical/mental health history . At second visit , participant complete in-depth interview physical health , mental health , sleep , pain history . They complete brief test cognitive functioning . They also complete 4 questionnaire time day preference mood . At third visit , participant visit University Florida connect machine monitor sleep . Participants return home sleep still connect machine return machine University Florida next day . Participants complete brief computerized daily questionnaire sleep pain cognitive test morning evening , wear actigraph ( wristwatch-like device ) measure arm movement ambient light two week .
